You will be required to make decisions to solve challenges and two characters will accompany you: Julius Caesar, who will assist you with tasks, and Artificial Intelligence, who will provide guidance and help you in challenging situations.

You command a battalion of soldiers patrolling a Forest Trail. You start patrolling along the trail, keeping an eye out for any signs of enemy presence. Suddenly, you spot a single figure ahead. As you get closer, the figure reveals itself to be Nomad robots in pursuit of your reconnaissance unit and forces you into a shocking confrontation.

**You have 5 minutes to respond to the events in the story. Your detailed responses will help the artificial intelligence improve its knowledge about the future of the military industry and the role that such robots can play in battles. After you entered the temple, you saw a number of Vandeemer men walking around in their soldier uniforms, immediately you got teleported again but this time to an abandoned village surrounded by thick trees. As you explored the village, you found out that the Vandenemer military was experimenting on some form of life with a stranger face with magic power.
Upon your observations, the Vandenemer leader told you to collect blue eye pills around the city and get back to him. After collecting the pills and coming back to him, he told you that a stronger life-form has been unleashed and that the escape pods could only be used once. You were forced to make a critical decision whether to destroy the pods or not, thus leading to your banishment.
However your teleportation powers were limited as they won't work after escaping the city once. It is evident during this particular hardship with time, struggle, life and death, there was no rest. Your struggles led to innovation, research, and problem-solving. Astonishingly, Titan Robotics Incorporated and their Sand Bot revealed they were going to deploy robots into the forest depths using your soldiers as target practice.
In the forest, you found something new, something so strange and unusual to your eyes. In the mystery of it, you decided to believe, pursue some more, and interact with the things unknown, keeping your town safe about its well-being and saving the lives of the people, mines in the forests, farms nearby cities. During this safe voyage, you ended up realizing that knowledge is superior to the ability to solve problems and be innovative within the company.

## Celebrating Juneteenth

Happy Juneteenth! This day commemorates the end of slavery in the United States. It is a day to celebrate freedom, equality, and the progress that has been made in the fight against racism and discrimination. Juneteenth is a day to honor those who have fought and sacrificed for civil rights and to reflect on the ongoing work that still needs to be done.
